live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.

45095.summary: Some customers in South Lacombe are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45095.title: Dec 16 – Lacombe (South) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
